item.title: Clue
item.description: Quiz The quiz requires JavaScript to validate the answer(s). Determine the mean of the two $sx$e values of the vertexes of $sy=x^2+3x+2$e , and $sy=-5x^2+45x-90$e , in the form $s\frac{a}{b}$e . $sa$e The SHA-256 hash of the answer is 7902699be42c8a8e46fbbb4501726517e86b22c56a189f7625a6da49081b2451. $sb$e The SHA-256 hash of the answer is 4b227777d4dd1fc61c6f884f48641d02b4d121d3fd328cb08b5531fcacdabf8a. Final answer code: enter an answer Explanation The vertex of the first equation is $s(\frac{-3}{2}, \frac{-1}{2}$e
